original_text:
For all his rules were before me,
    and from his statutes I did not turn aside.
korean_text: 그의 모든 법도를 내 앞에 두고 그의 규례를 버리지 아니하였음이로다

sentences.original_text: For all his rules were before me
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 모든 규례는 내 앞에 있었으니

sentences.original_text: and from his statutes I did not turn aside.
